ygData.subject: Re: Location of pages for research
ygData.msgSnippet: So who is looking for the illegible cantrips?
ygData.messageBody:
So who is looking for the illegible cantrips?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Miller, Keith A. [SMTP:keithm@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 3:14 PM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Location of pages for research
>
> From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>
>
> Wrong continent ;)
>
> These are quest items in Freeport, not Felwithe. Admittedly, I have
> never found the scrolls Jyleel wants, but I have turned in the cantrips
> to the appropriate person.
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: King, Darrin [mailto:dking@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 3:02 PM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Location of pages for research
>
>
> From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>
>
> *Thats a quest item, not research.
> *For my part, I have found an 'Illegible cantrip' on an orc
> *apprentice. Not sure what class' research item that is,
> *but I'm pretty sure it isn't ours...
>
>
> Actually, I turned that in to Jyleel before and it's not what he
> wants... he
> wants the orc oracle scrolls, not the illegible cantrips.
>
> So, I believe the illegible cantrips found on orc apprentices are indeed
> research items, but, like you said, not for us, as Enchanters.
>
